title: AE脚本：批量快速替换AE模板中图片视频素材 Photos Videos Comps To Comps
author: 大众脸
content: Photos Videos Comps To Comps是一个用于After Effects的脚本工具，能够快速批量替换模板中的图片、视频等素材。通过简单的两步操作，用户可以选择需要替换的素材和目标合成，实现一键批量替换功能，大大提高了修改AE模板的效率。

other.original_description: This After Effects script will automatically add your imported items (Photos, Videos, Comps, Solids…) to the selected compositions in only two clicks. In a drop-down menu select your desired screen orientation acording to your selected compositions (Landscape, Portrait or Original).
other.official_website: 官网地址未在原文中明确给出
